section.title: Key Features
section.para: Anyframe Query Manager is an Eclipse Plugin which enables the easier management and utilization of database Query statement needed for Query Service in ANyframe, Samsung SDS application framework. Anyframe Query Manager is expected to speed up development and enhance productivity though the following core functions.

section.title: Query Manager Perspective
section.para: Providing Query Manager Perspective including various View and Context Menu, etc. that help the convenient management of query statement.

section.title: Managing Query Life-Cycle
section.para: Life-Cycle Management support on various Query statements utilized through Anyframe Query Service

listitem.para: Easy to set Query mapping xml file that can be used in Anyframe Query Service
Easy to add/update/delete Query through Query Manager Editor, Query Explorer and Query Test Editor
Easy to check outline of Query mapping xml defined by project and whether Query ID is used or duplicated through defined icon
Query ID search function on Query statement
Check whether Query statement is used based on Query ID
Content Assist function for easy utilization of Query set on DAO utilizing Anyframe Query Service
Convenient navigation between Query Explorer and Query mapping xml file
Convenient navigation to specific vo related to Query
Convenient navigation to specific Query used in DAO
